nodes.text: A macro protocol could be used to wipe the memories of multiple droids simultaneously. During the Clone Wars, Jaybo Hood, a young human boy from Iego, used a macro protocol on a squad of battle droids left behind by the Confederacy of Independent Systems when they abandoned his homeworld, after which he spent nine months reprogramming them into his personal servants.

Macro protocols were first mentioned in "Mystery of a Thousand Moons," the eighteenth episode of the animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' first season, which originally aired on February 13, 2009.
